title: If the PBE is any sign of what this community wants, can we please enable URF for a week?
body: From day to night the PBE has been overflowing with 'testers' who want to play URF. If you don't believe me just try logging into the PBE. It takes at least an hour if you are lucky, something that is rarely seen unless a new champion is released. This is all because of URF and I fear that if we only keep it for 3 days there is going to be a huge out roar from the community saying to bring back URF. So just know this, when you get death threats from the community telling you to keep it for 4 more days, I get to say I told you so.

replies.body: yes urf for around a week pls

Right?! It took 2 hours to get in and the queue was over 9,000 multiple times. 

All my years of being on PBE, this only happens when URF is around.
